Akeem Gardner, Canurta's founder, is a bold entrepreneur equipped with the unique blend of academic, athletic, and professional experiences necessary to lead the company and deliver exceptional shareholder value. Holding two degrees – a Bachelor of Arts with a Major in Psychology and a Minor in Philosophy, and a Bachelor of Laws – Akeem has honed his ability to grasp complex scientific concepts, apply rational problem-solving techniques, and navigate the intricate landscape of regulatory guidelines, IP, and patent strategy.

Five years ago, Akeem embarked on a journey to cultivate hemp, driven by his passion for uncovering innovative approaches that revolutionize industries affecting our well-being. With a relentless determination to introduce genuine, nature-based solutions to inflammation, Akeem aims to tackle the world's most pressing health challenges – effectively and safely preventing and managing chronic diseases.

As the driving force behind Canurta, Akeem's entrepreneurial spirit, diverse skillset, and unwavering commitment to bettering global health serve as the foundation for the company's success and growth, instilling confidence in investors and stakeholders alike.
